name: VaporGrid
description:
How To Play:

  1. Press the arrow shown on the tile you wish to move to
  2. Press the keys on beat to move around the grid and increase your combo score
  3. If you are off beat twice in a row, your combo score will be reset
  4. Collect blue power cells to add your combo score to your total score
  5. Watch out for skulls! If one touches you your total sore will be reset.

This game is early in development. Feel free to leave feedback or ideas in the comments it would be much appreciated. Thanks for playing!
